message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $150. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really like it. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product but I'm only able to pay $100 right now.  Would you be willing to work with me on that?

Hi Bob, I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $125. Let me know if that's more to your liking!
